title: Ski-Doo Snow X Racing (Emulated for PC)
description:
The cold weather brings out the hottest racing action in Ski-Doo Snow SXR Racing for PS2. Choose from over 13 different characters and 8 outfits, then gun for the finish line on more than 13 authentic Ski-Doo snowmobiles. Realistic physics and advanced handling make it feel like you're driving the real thing - it's going to be a couple fun and bumpy rides! 

Conquer 18 challenging courses, ranging from open cross country trails in Northern Sweden to an insane cross track in New York City. Unlock 36 parts you can use to upgrade your snowmobile, master 16 high-flying stunts, race a friend in two-player split screen, and more.


Includes PCSX2-1.2.1 with bios, plugins, & set-up pics.

Extract with winrar, or 7zip.

Extracted size is 3.08 gig.


System Requirements:

Core 2 duo 2.4GHz or higher.

nVidia GeForce GT 640 / ATI Radeon HD 6 series or higher.

3 Gig of ram or more.

Windows: XP / Vista / 7
